title: Stillmaker
content:
Stillmaker Very Rare 3~6 Damage 1d4 +2 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Hold PersonLevel 3 Enchantment Spell Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The dagger's hoisting blade is designed to nick the flesh as many times as possible, allowing its paralytic poison to flow effortlessly into any unfortunate target.
